message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and benefits, we estimate its value to be well above $1200000. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1500000. This offer includes a comprehensive consultation to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems and processes. We look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your operations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've presented, and I'm willing to work with you to ensure a smooth integration. Can you consider this offer?
